Paris.landmarks: Tour Eiffel, Museé de Louvre, Museé d'Orsay, Hotel des Invalides, Palais Bourbon, Place de la Concorde, Panthéon, Les Catacombes de Paris, Jardin du Trocadéro, L'Église Notre Dame et Sacré Coeur

Amsterdam.landmarks: Canals Cruise, Rijksmuseum, Van Gogh Museum, Royal Palace of Amsterdam, Rembrandt House Museum, National Maritime Museum

Vienna & Prague.landmarks: Hofburg, Belvedere, Schönbrunn, Naturhistorisches Museum Wien, Votivkirche, Prague Castle, St. Nicholas' Church,  Powder Tower, Dancing Tower, Clementinum, Franz Kafka Museum, Charles Bridge, National Museum of Prague

Munich & Salzburg.landmarks: Frauenkirche, Marienplatz, Neues Rathaus, Englischer Garten, Olympiapark, Neue & Alte Pinaothek, Schloss Nymphenburg,  Hohensalzburg Castle, St. Peter's Abbey, Residenzplatz, Schloss Hellbrunn

Oslo & Norwegian Fjords.landmarks: Fijords Cruise, Vigeland Sculpture Park, Akershus Fortress,  Viking Ship Museum, Munch Museum,  Royal Palace, Holmenkollen Ski Jump and Museum, Oslo Cathedral

Copenhagen & Stockholm.landmarks: Gamla Stan, Vasa Museum, Djurgården, Royal Palace of Stockholm, Moderna Museet, Tivoli Gardens, Christiansborg Palace,  National Gallery of Denmark, Nyhavn Harbor,

Saint Petersburg.landmarks: Church of the Savior on Spilled Blood, State Hermitage Museum, Peter and Paul Fortress, Peterhof Palace, Eliseyev Emporium, Vasilyevsky Island, Nevsky Avenue,

Pyramids of Giza.landmarks: Great Pyramid (Pyramid of Cheops or Pyramid of Khufu), Solar Boat Museum, Western Cemetery, Pyramid of Chephren, Pyramid of Mycerinus, Sphinx

Luxor.landmarks: Temple of Karnak, Valley of the Kings, Luxor Temple, Temple of Deir al-Bahri,  Tombs of the Nobles, Colossi of Memnon, Ramesseum

Memphis.landmarks: Imhotep Museum, Step Pyramid of Djoser, Niankhkhnum and Khnumhotep's Mastaba, Pyramids of Dahshour, Sakkara Museum

Cape Town.landmarks: Table Mountain,  Signal Hill and the Noon Gun, Clifton and Camps Bay Beaches, Robben IslandCity Hall & the Castle of Good Hope, Penguins Seeing at Boulders Bay

Kruger National Park.landmarks: Full-day Safari in Kruger, Masorini ruins, Albasini ruins, Stevenson-Hamilton Memorial Library

Drakensberg.landmarks: Drakensberg Canopy Tour, Underberg Studio, Hot Air Ballooning in Kamberg, MTB and Running Nature Trail

Cape Winelands.landmarks: Boschendal, Jonkershoek Nature Reserve, Delaire Wine Tasting, Huguenot Memorial, Franschhoek Motor Museum

Marrakesh.landmarks: Djemaa El Fna, Koutoubia Mosque, Medersa Ben Youssef,  Saadian Tombs, Dar Si Said Museum of Moroccan Arts and Crafts, Marrakesh Museum, Majorelle Gardens

High Atlas Mountains.landmarks: Ait Ben Haddou, Ouarzazate, Telouet, Tifoultoute, Dades Valley

Moulay Idriss Zerhoun.landmarks: Ourika Valley, Draa Valley,  Almoravid Koubba, Badi Palace, Manara Gardens, Tizi-n'Test Pass

Essaouira.landmarks: Essaouira Beach, Had Draa Souq, Simon Attias Synagogue, Île de Mogador

Istanbul.landmarks: Hagia Sophia, Topkapi Palace, Maiden's Tower, Grand Bazaar, Sultanahmet Camii (Blue Mosque), Archeological Museum, Yerebatan Sarnici, Galata Tower, Taksim Square, Rumeli Hisari, Pera Museum, Dolmabahçe Palace, Fenerbahçe

Tokyo.landmarks: The Imperial Palace, The Sensō-ji Temple, National Museum of Nature and Science, Ueno Park and Zoo, Tokyo National Museum, National Museum of Western Art, Kabuki-za Theatre

Cherry Blossom Viewing.landmarks: Sapporo: Moerenuma Park, Hakodate: Goryokaku Tower and Fort Goryokaku, Furano: Asahigaoka Park, Otaru: Mt. Tengu, Asahikawa: Asahikawa Park

Great Wall.landmarks: Mutianyu, Jinshanling, Simatai Night Tour, Huanghuacheng, Juyongguan  Fort, Badaling Fortress

Forbidden City & Beijing.landmarks: The Hall of Supreme Harmony, Palace of Heavenly Purity, The Palace of Earthly Tranquility, The Imperial Palace, Tiananmen Square, The Temple of Heaven

Terracota Army.landmarks: Bronze Chariot Exhibit, Ancient Weapons Museum, Terracota Army Vault

Silk Road.landmarks: Longmen Grottoes, The Museum of the Imperial Carriages of the Emperor of the Zhou Dynasty / Urumqi: Grand Bazaar, Xinjiang Museum/ Kashgar: Lake Karakuli, Kashgar Old Town, Grand Erdaoqiao Sunday Bazaar
